S

send(Message) - Method in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Connection
This method serializes the message into ObjectOutputStream
sendBroadcastMessage(Message) - Static method in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Server
method sends message to all connections from connectionMap.
sendListOfUsers(Connection, String) - Method in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Server.Handler
Method goes through the connectionMap and for each element gets the client's name.
sendTextMessage(String) - Method in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Client
creates a new text message using the transmitted text and sends it to the server via the connection.
Server - Class in aleksandrov.Chat
The main class of the server.
Server() - Constructor for class Aleksandrov.Chat.Server
 
Server.Handler - Class in aleksandrov.Chat
Class which will exchange messages with the client, while main thread is waiting for new connection
serverHandshake(Connection) - Method in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Server.Handler
The method accepts the connection as a parameter, and returns the name of the new client.
serverMainLoop(Connection, String) - Method in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Server.Handler
this method is the main loop of processing of messages by the server.
socket - Variable in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Connection
Fields for socket and it's streams
socket - Variable in class Aleksandrov.Chat.Server.Handler
socket for current connection
